reviewText: Like her other video, Beyond Barre Fit, Beyond Barre Grace is a very nice workout. The set-up is the same as Beyond Barre Fit. Here, however, this is a lighter workout, hence why it's called Grace. You don't use a Pilates Band, but you do use weights for the Upper Body toning section. Also, you can use a chair in place of a ballet barre. Colleen, of course, uses a ballet barre. The two issues I brought up in my review of  Beyond Barre Fit, are again present here. Please read that review for further clarification.
